io.ktor.server.engine

类 BaseApplicationEngine

  • io.ktor.server.engine.BaseApplicationEngine
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ApplicationEngine

    public class BaseApplicationEngine
implements ApplicationEngine

    Base class for implementing interface ApplicationEngine

    It creates default engine pipeline, provides application property and installs default transformations on respond and receive

    另请参阅:
    interface ApplicationEngine

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BaseApplicationEngine

        public BaseApplicationEngine(ApplicationEngineEnvironment environment,
                             EnginePipeline pipeline)

        Base class for implementing interface ApplicationEngine

        It creates default engine pipeline, provides application property and installs default transformations on respond and receive

        参数:
        environment - Environment with which this engine is running
        environment - instance of interface ApplicationEngineEnvironment for this engine
        pipeline - pipeline to use with this engine
        另请参阅:
        interface ApplicationEngine
